title: ACE IN A HOLE 1951 - KIRK DOUGLAS

sources.title: ACE IN A HOLE 1951 - KIRK DOUGLAS
sources.description: I'll let you find out for yourselves why this is one of the best movies ever made. Ace in the Hole, also known as The Big Carnival, is a 1951 American satirical drama film directed, produced, and co-written by Billy Wilder. The film stars Kirk Douglas as a cynical, disgraced reporter who creates a media circus surrounding a man trapped in a cave in rural New Mexico to try to regain a job on a major newspaper.
